word:
Rahab
Joshua 2 and 6; Hebrews 11:30, 31
   RAHAB WAS  A HARLOT WHO LIVED ON THE WALL OF JERICHO. SHE HID THE TWO ISRAELITE SPIES SENT TO CHECK OUT THE DEFENSES OF THAT CITY. BECAUSE OF HER KINDNESS TO THEM, AND HER DECLARATION OF  BELIEF IN GOD, THE SPIES PROMISED THAT THE LIVES OF RAHAB AND HER FAMILY WOULD BE SPARED WHEN THE ATTACK CAME ON JERICHO.
